fields.description:
As a fan, I want to view upcoming matches and set reminders so I never miss a game.
Reminders should trigger push notifications 30 min before match start time.
Edge cases include: changing time zones, overlapping reminders.
Acceptance Criteria:
- Match dates are displayed in local time
- Users can enable/disable reminders per match
- Reminder triggers a notification

fields.summary: Add leaderboard showing top scorers and stats
fields.description:
As a user, I want to see a leaderboard of the top Quidditch players with stats such as:
- Goals
- Assists
- MVPs
- Saves

Stats should be updated after every match.
Acceptance Criteria:
- Leaderboard is sorted by goals
- Each player's row includes profile picture and team

fields.summary: Allow users to place match predictions and display odds
fields.description:
As a user, I want to predict the winner of a match and see current odds.
Optional: leaderboard of users with best prediction accuracy.
Acceptance Criteria:
- Odds update based on overall predictions
- Bets are time-locked X minutes before match
- UI shows predicted team and win chance

fields.summary: Push notification system for key match events
fields.description:
Send real-time push notifications for key in-game events:
- Match start
- Score change
- Red cards
- Match end

Acceptance Criteria:
- Events are pushed in <5s
- Notification content is concise and relevant
- User can choose which event types to receive
